conform.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to behave in the way that most other people in your group or society behave
conform.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the pressure on schoolchildren to conform
people who do not conform to traditional standards of behaviour
conform.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to obey a law, rule etc
conform.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Students can be expelled for refusing to conform to school rules.
All new buildings must conform with the regional development plan.
products which conform to international safety standards
conform.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to obey a law or rule
conform.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The website owner must conform with the requirements of the Data Protection Act.
The property conformed to all the latest building regulations.
